House Bill/Resolution NO. HB04828
FULL TITLE : AN ACT TO PROVIDE A SEPARATE BUDGET-SUBSIDY TO THE LOCALIZED COMMUNITY MORTGAGE PROGRAM (LCMP), TO EMPOWER LOCAL GOVERNMENT HOUSING PROGRAMS, AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
ABSTRACT : Seeks to ensure that the community association (CAs) complies to the submission of requirements, eliminate disputes among members of the CAs, provide sufficient Social Housing Finance Corporation (SHFC) human resource complement for the program and, provide the proper financial assistance.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : ROMERO, MICHAEL ODYLON L., Ph.D., PINEDA, ENRICO A.
DATE FILED : 2017-01-25
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
